headline: 3 Reasons MGM is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Although the S&P 500 is down 2.2% over the past six months, MGM Resorts’s stock price has fallen further to $31.80, losing shareholders 16.9% of their capital. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
